name: Space Party (itch) (Sevcon Games)
description:
Space Party is a (not) fun clicker game! We will soon be working on some updates as soon as we reach our donation goal. PLEASE DO NOT COPY THE GAME ENTIRELY. You should also click the "How to Play" button, coz' it's pretty obvious. We're just weird 10-year-olds (no, seriously) who know nothing about game development and using Construct.
Have fun! :D
